thread.section_title: Palazzo Navona Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, great service
thread.title_full: Great location, great service - Review of Palazzo Navona Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Kevin M
title: Great location, great service
text: Staff was excellent at answering all questions, making suggestions, and arranging anything we needed. Location was great as we could walk to anything. Rooms were nice. I would consider it a 4 star as opposed to a 5 star, but that is often the case with European hotels I have found.
